entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanirajak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:09 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -42.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sanirajak (Hall Beach Airport) 4:00 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -42.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 14.5 km
Humidity: 61 %
Wind Chill: -59
Dewpoint: -47.3°C
Wind: NW 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 36 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Blowing snow overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 36 by morning. Wind chill minus 58 this evening and minus 53 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 35.
entry.summary: Sunny. Blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 35. Wind chill near minus 56. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: Clear. Blowing snow in the evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 53 in the evening and minus 58 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
